name: PokemonQuiz(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, open pokemon quiz unofficial”
”Alexa, start pokemon quiz unofficial”
”Alexa, launch pokemon quiz unofficial”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pokemon quiz unofficial
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Pokemon Quiz (Unofficial)" is an Alexa Skill Game to test your Pokemon knowledge.
Users are asked pokemon questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Challenge your friends and family and find out who will be the winner!

Have Fun!
